title: Outlaws
description: Play your friends online in this multi-player reaction based Mexican Standoff! May the best win ;)

title: Mentii
description: A platform to help those without family connections to better network with mentors in a world that has gone virtual.

title: WeWe Code
description: Built a platform for a pair programming community for new coders to build personal projects.

title: Find Your Fun
description: A single page that scrapes different sources to centralize a list of all the events around Ann Arbor.
